question: Are the ocelli present?
Is the head significantly shorter than it is broad?
Are there bristle like hairs at the sides of the frons in front of the eyes?
Which description best fits the thoracis notum?
answer: Broader and longer than the head, with a convex anterior margin (15)

question: Is abdominal tergite 5 divided into two parts, with the anterior part being a semi-circular flap attached only along its straight, anterior edge?
Are the ocelli present?
Is the head significantly shorter than it is broad?
Are there bristle like hairs at the sides of the frons in front of the eyes?
Which description best fits the thoracis notum?
answer: As broad as the head but clearly shorter, with a somewhat concave anterior margin (29)
